name: Psychic Human-Back Joust-Fencing Duels for Honor (and Princess)
name_original: Psychic Human-Back Joust-Fencing Duels for Honor (and Princess)
description:
In this kingdom, horses ride knights for their chance to woo the beautiful princess.

How to Play:

- Hit your opponent with your sword to score a point.

- Alternatively, you can capture the beautiful princess to instantly win the match. Stand on her for 5 seconds to rescue her.

Controls:

Player 1:

- A and D to move.

- W to jump.

- S to stab.

- F to switch faced direction.

Player 2:

- LEFT and RIGHT to move.

- UP to jump.

- DOWN to stab.

- LEFT CTRL to switch faced direction.

Credits:

  • Art and Animation: Mikail Khan
  • Voice Acting: Peter Francis
  • Programming: Sebastian Scaini
